meanings.sent1: My sisters and I love playing together.
meanings.sent2: She has two sisters, one older and one younger.
meanings.sent3: The sisters giggled as they shared secrets.
meanings.sent4: Their bond as sisters was unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: Growing up with sisters means never feeling alone.

meanings.definition: A woman or girl who has the same parents as another person.
meanings.sent1: Her sister always helps her with homework.
meanings.sent2: The two sisters look very similar.
meanings.sent3: The sisters inherited their mother's artistic talent.
meanings.sent4: Their sisterly love was evident to everyone.
meanings.sent5: The bond between sisters is special and unique.

meanings.definition: A woman who shares a common interest or profession with another.
meanings.sent1: They are sisters in their love for music.
meanings.sent2: The two sisters are both doctors.
meanings.sent3: The sisters formed a band and started performing together.
meanings.sent4: Their collaboration as sisters brought success.
meanings.sent5: The sisters' dedication to their craft is inspiring.
